page.title: 18RIVERS
page.content: The River Bann is a very large river.It flows from the Deers Meadow through Lough Neigh to the Atlantic Ocean.It runs in under the 8 mile bridge in Hilltown.There is a whirlpool further on down the river.A man has said to be drowned very near there one time Many people use the river for fishing and swimming although there are not many fish round the 8 mile bridge but there are salmon and other kinds of fish near the waterfall.All of the water runs into Spelga Dam but only some of it is cleaned so that we can wash ourselves and drink it. There is a road that goes on past the river and it is called the Bann Loanen.In the summer you can go on walks with the youth club.Also in the summer you can go down to the river and have a picnic. BY ELAINE McGREEVY
